    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initialize the main menu

        LAMBDA JUSTIFICATIONS: The lambda function used for the first-level division name adds readability by replacing the division id in the table view.

        Every appointment table uses a lambda function to customize the display of their start and end times. The start and end time lambdas add the current time zone to the entries to be more descriptive.

        The month drop down menu in the first report uses lambda functions to change how the month is displayed. Originally, the months are displayed in all capital letters, but now, only the first letter is capitalized.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        resourceBundle - the resource bundle
